title.en: Condominiums you can Buy Now, and Condominiums you Shouldn't Buy - Read on manga to understand!

altTitles.ja: 今、買っていいマンション買ってはいけないマンション―まんがで読むからよくわかる!

description.en:
2003 is the time to buy an apartment! An easy-to-understand introduction to the "know-how of choosing an apartment" taught by a real estate research professional. What kind of condominium is really good to buy now??
　　Now," the real estate industry is whispering about the 2003 problem. After the bubble burst, the released land was redeveloped into office buildings and condominiums, which were completed one after another in 2003. In 2003, when many low-priced condominiums will be supplied, it is time to buy an apartment. However, there are many condominiums with low prices and problems. That is why we are required to have eyes to see through high-quality condominiums. Therefore, we will introduce the “know-how for choosing an apartment” taught by a real estate research professional in an easy-to-understand manner!
